column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I wish this place was more convenient to go to
column2: because it's easily one of my favorite ramen spots. Though it looks like they changed the menu since I've been last
column3: it seemed like there were less ramen options than when I came the last time. The ramen I got seemed pretty unassuming to me at first but before I knew it
column4: my bowl was empty. This is definitely a social place. If you come alone and don't want to be seated next to a stranger at the long table
column5: you may want to try to get a seat at the bar. It's kind of loud
column7: but the ramen is easily one of the best in Houston.
